empyema.context: Empyema of the left chest and consolidation of the left lung.

consolidation.context: Empyema of the left chest and consolidation of the left lung.

lung abscesses.context: Empyema of the left chest, consolidation of the left lung, lung abscesses of the left upper lobe and left lower lobe.

respiratory symptoms.context: The patient has a complex history, which goes back about four months ago when she started having respiratory symptoms

hemoptysis.context: one week ago she was admitted to another hospital with hemoptysis

30-year history of cigarette smoking.context: The patient had a 30-year history of cigarette smoking.

brownish fluid.context: A chest tube was placed at the other hospital, which produced some brownish fluid that had foul odor, actually what was thought to be a fecal-like odor.

bloody mucous.context: The patient had a flexible fiberoptic bronchoscopy that showed no endobronchial lesions, but there was bloody mucous in the left main stem bronchus

erythema of the mucosa.context: there was some erythema of the mucosa noted in the airways in the bronchi

dense consolidation.context: remarkable findings included a very dense consolidation of the entire lung such that it was very hard and firm throughout

purulent material.context: There were many pockets of purulent material, which had a gray-white appearance to it.
